name: Neko Hiroi Masita
description:
###### ADULT GAME #####

You pick up a cat maid to live together and have physical intimacies in this mini-game.
3 H scenes with 18 variations.

Can be enjoyed on both smartphones and PCs.
Please confirm system compatibility via the trial version before purchasing.

CV: Chiroru Ohyama
Artwork: Milk Shake

*Language switchable: Japanese, English & Chinese (Chinese is translated by the circle)
